meanings.sent1: She managed to outgamble her friends in the card game.
meanings.sent2: He always tries to outgamble his opponents in poker.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to outgamble the dog in a game of dice.
meanings.sent4: The student outgambled the teacher in a friendly bet.
meanings.sent5: The magician outgambled the audience with his card tricks.

meanings.definition: To surpass in a game of chance.
meanings.sent1: The lucky player was able to outgamble everyone at the casino.
meanings.sent2: It's not easy to outgamble the odds in a game of roulette.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel tried to outgamble the birds in finding hidden nuts.
meanings.sent4: The young athlete outgambled the older competitors in the race.
meanings.sent5: The detective outgambled the criminals in solving the case.
